title: GG's 2023 Game of the Year: Parallel
description: The dark sci-fi card game is in closed beta, but already offers stunning character art, deep strategy, and rewarding gameplay.

title: Approaching the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs: Strategies for redemption and market impact
description:
It has been widely accepted that Bitcoin ETF applications have been the main driver for Bitcoin’s return to the April 2022 level at above $40k. The thesis is simple: with a new layer of institutional legitimacy, the capital pool for Bitcoin inflow would deepen. From hedge funds and commodity trading advisors (CTAs) to mutual and […]

The post Approaching the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs: Strategies for redemption and market impact appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Unlocking the Potential of Satellite Technology with AI: A New Era in Earth Observation
description: The skies above us are not just empty space; they are teeming with thousands of satellites, including those designed to observe our planet. Over 8,000 active satellites currently orbit Earth, with more than a thousand focused on Earth observation.  In this ever-evolving landscape, the convergence of satellite technology and artificial intelligence (AI) is poised to […]

title: Artificial Intelligence’s (AI) Growing Impact on Elections Raises Concerns
description: As the 2024 U.S. presidential election looms, concerns about the influence of artificial intelligence (AI) on the democratic process have taken center stage. Digital experts warn that the use of AI, particularly in the form of deepfake videos, disinformation campaigns, and personalized persuasion, poses a serious threat to the integrity of elections. title: Bitcoin proponents kick against proposed US crypto ban
description: A petition aiming to prevent a proposed crypto ban in the U.S. has garnered attention. The Chamber of Digital Commerce has outlined concerns regarding anti-money laundering.

title: Japanese cabinet approves crypto tax reform in 2024 fiscal plan
description: The Japanese government has approved an amendment to the taxation of companies holding third-party-issued cryptocurrencies in its fiscal 2024 tax reform plan.
